means: 计件工作，按件计酬的工作

sentence.Network_en: I get paid for piecework, not on a monthly wage.

entry.def: If you do piecework, you are paid according to the amount of work that you do rather than the length of time that you work.

example.ex: All my men are on piece-work...
example.tran: 我所有的工人做的都是计件工。

example.ex: The tobacco workers were paid on a piecework basis.
example.tran: 烟草工人拿的是计件报酬。

means.word_mean: 1. work paid for according to the quantity produced

auth_sentence.content: Unlike doctors at the Mayo Clinic, he told me, those in Grand Junction get piecework fees from insurers.
